resources.string: This page would let you purchase a book using the stripe API
this page allows users to see the library of audiobooks they have downloaded
this page allows users to search for audiobooks. From the results you can see more information about a book and also purchase the book
This page allows the user to see more information about the book they are either looking to buy or the book that is currently playing
Here is some text about the book.
this page allows user to browse popular audiobooks, or audiobooks recommended for them
